# Animint2 Gallery by Biplab Sutradhar

Welcome to the Animint2 gallery! Below, you'll find visualizations created using the R package [animint2](https://github.com/animint/animint2). Each entry includes a visualization link, the corresponding repository, and the source details.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(knitr)
library(nc)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  results = "asis"
)

# Function to create HTML links
ahref <- function(href, text) {
  sprintf('<a href="%s">%s</a>', href, text)
}

# Function to process meta.csv and update paths
myread <- function(csv, repo.col) {
  nc::capture_first_df(
    fread(csv),
    viz_owner_repo = list(owner = ".*?", "/", repo_only = ".*")
  )[
    , img.png := sprintf("https://%s.github.io/%s/Capture.PNG", owner, repo_only)
  ][
    , viz.link := ahref(
      sprintf("https://%s.github.io/%s/", owner, repo_only),
      ifelse(
        file.exists(img.png),
        sprintf('<img src="%s" alt="%s" />', img.png, viz_owner_repo),
        viz_owner_repo)
    )
  ]
}
